permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view and browse all uploaded assets like videos, audios, and ebooks.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to upload and register new assets.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to modify asset metadata and update files.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove assets from the platform.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view movie listings and details.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to add new movies to the platform.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to edit movie metadata or files.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove movies from the system.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view and browse TV/web series.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to create and organize new series.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to manage seasons and episodes.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove series or specific episodes.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view scheduled or past live streams.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to schedule new live streams.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to update timing or metadata of live streams.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to cancel or remove old live streams.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view and listen to podcast content.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to upload new podcast episodes.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to edit podcast metadata or episodes.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove podcast content.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view and play music albums.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to upload or organize new albums.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to update album metadata or tracks.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove albums from the library.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view and monitor existing subscription plans.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to create new subscription plans.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to edit pricing, duration, and plan limits.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove obsolete or duplicate plans.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to monitor PPV items and purchases.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to configure new PPV events or content.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to update pricing, duration, or content assignment.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove expired or invalid PPV items.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view available promotional campaigns.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to create discount codes and campaigns.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to edit discounts, rules, or expiration dates.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove expired or invalid promotions.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view registered viewers and their profiles.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to onboard new viewer accounts manually.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to modify viewer details or settings.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to deactivate or remove viewer accounts.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view domain settings and connected custom domains.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits users to add new domains for branding.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants users the ability to configure DNS, SSL, or hostname settings.

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables users to remove linked domains.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows users to view staff/admins and their roles.

permissions.name: Can Add
permissions.description: Permits creation of new staff users and assign roles.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants ability to change roles

permissions.name: Can Delete
permissions.description: Enables removing or deactivating staffs and roles.

permissions.name: Can View
permissions.description: Allows access to platform-level configuration and settings.

permissions.name: Can Change
permissions.description: Grants ability to update themes, languages, and platform rules.
